TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ClearTypeHint extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: An enumeration that specifies a hint to the rendering engine that text can be rendered with ClearType.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderOptions.ClearTypeHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName> attached property to control how text is rendered on a translucent background. For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Media.RenderOptions.ClearTypeHint%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.ClearTypeHint Auto = int32(0)

Docs.summary: The rendering engine uses ClearType when it is possible. If opacity is introduced, ClearType is disabled for that subtree.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Media.ClearTypeHint Enabled = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The rendering engine re-enables ClearType for the current subtree. Where opacity is introduced in this subtree, ClearType is disabled.
